question: UNESCO's MGIEP and this state plans to set up gaming hub, special school.
explanation: Andhra Pradesh Government along with the UNESCO Mahatma Gandhi Institute of Education for Peace and Sustainable Development (MGIEP) is planning to set up a gaming for e-learning hub. The hub will also be a centre of excellence for children with learning differences. It will have links with the universities and institutes like IITs and IIMs. The hub will advise universities on future courses that they have to design.
